function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Higher percentage of responses hearing neighbor noise in flats","Impact":"Increased annoyance and reduced quality of life for residents","Mitigation":"Improved sound insulation and noise reduction measures in flats","Technologies":"Soundproof windows, acoustic insulation, noise-reducing materials","People":"Residents living in flats","Owner":"Building management or landlords"},{"Description":"Statistical differences in annoyance ratings for different noise sources","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health and well-being of residents","Mitigation":"Noise reduction measures, community policies, and awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Noise-cancelling devices, sound barriers, community noise regulations","People":"Residents of the buildings","Owner":"Community leaders, local authorities"},{"Description":"Difference in neighbor noise perception based on time spent in different areas of the house","Impact":"Variation in exposure to disruptive noise sources","Mitigation":"Strategic placement of noise-reducing measures in living spaces","Technologies":"Strategic soundproofing, noise barriers, acoustical treatments","People":"Residents of the buildings","Owner":"Residents and building management"}]}
